Key Match Events: Devon Conway carried his bat for 92* in a 58-ball innings
Tim Southee took 3 wickets for 6 runs
Mitch Santner took 3 wickets for 31 runs
Glenn Phillips took a spectacular catch to dismiss Marcus Stoinis
Australia was bowled out for 111 in 18 overs
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand had not beaten Australia in any format in Australia since 2011
Aaron Finch chose to bowl after winning the toss
Tim Southee and Mitch Santner were named for the New Zealand team
Glenn Maxwell and Pat Cummins passed 20 runs for Australia
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Finch acknowledged that Australia was outplayed in all facets of the game
Tim Southee said it was a statement from the Black Caps and cause for serious concern for Australia
New Zealand's first win in any format in Australia since 2011
Australia needs a near-perfect run from here on out to stand any chance of qualifying for the semi-finals
Miscellaneous Highlights: David Warner was bowled after a delivery deflected off his glove, thigh, and bat before hitting the stumps
Glenn Phillips took a screamer of a catch to dismiss Marcus Stoinis
